    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="sl">Matematične domine - ulomki</string>
            <string language="en">Mathematical dominoes - fractions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mathematische Dominoes - Brüche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dominos mathématiques - fractions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dominoes matemáticos - frações</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Domino matematici - frazioni</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μαθηματικά ντόμινο - μέρη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Dominós matemáticos - fracciones</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Domine natisnemo na papir. Domine plastificiramo in nalepimo na lesene podlage v velikosti domin. Učenci povezujejo račun z njegovim rezultatom.</string>
            <string language="en">Game of dominoes that have fractions and fraction calculations instead of simple spots.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">ulomek</string>
            <string language="en">fraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">domine</string>
            <string language="en">dominoes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">seštevanje</string>
            <string language="en">addition</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">odštevanje</string>
            <string language="en">subtraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spiel von Dominoes, die Brüche und 
Bruchberechnungen anstelle von den einfachen Punkten haben.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Jeu des dominos qui ont des fractions et des 
calculs de fraction au lieu des taches simples.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Jogo dos dominoes que têm frações e cálculos 
da fração em vez dos pontos simples.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gioco dei domino che hanno le frazioni e calcoli 
della frazione anziché i punti semplici.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παιχνίδι των ντόμινο που έχουν τα μέρη και τους 
υπολογισμούς μέρους αντί των απλών σημείων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Juego de los dominós que tienen fracciones y 
cálculos de la fracción en vez de puntos simples.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bruch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dominoes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hinzufügung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Abzug</string>
          </keyword>
